attributes.action: dual the A64 from York to Scarborough AS A MATTER OF URGENCY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This hideously busy road has been screaming out for dualling for decades.Inept Government Ministers have time and again reneged on promises to complete the dualling between York's 1976 bypass and Scarborough.The improvement is VITAL to saving lives, reducing journey times and improving the prosperity of East Coast resorts.The route is currently a national disgrace and its current state would NOT be tolerated if nearer London.

WE NEED ACTION NOW.
